ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound bacon, cut in half

cookingTips: Pat water chestnuts dry before wrapping to help bacon crisp
Brush glaze on during last 5 minutes of baking to prevent burning
Arrange on a rack over the baking sheet so fat can drip away
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how to wrap small items with bacon evenly and why basting at the end prevents the glaze from burning.
